languages.text: Некоторое время улицы Комморры гремели слухами о мон-кай с цепным зверем, вершащим свое извращенное правосудие, но вскоре все стихло. Зато на арене появился новый гладиатор: мускулистый врак с пришитой к телу головой пса. Он погиб, попытавшись взобраться на трибуну архонта во время очередного представления.

For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.
languages.original_text: Некоторое время улицы Комморры гремели слухами о мон-кай с цепным зверем, вершащим свое извращенное правосудие, но вскоре все стихло. Зато на арене появился новый гладиатор: мускулистый врак с пришитой к телу головой пса. Он погиб, попытавшись взобраться на трибуну архонта во время очередного представления.

traits.locale_text: For a while, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with rumours of a mon-keigh with a leashed beast that exacted its perverse justice, but they soon died down. However, a new gladiator entered the arena, a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn on. He died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during one of the shows.

For a while, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with rumours of a mon-keigh with a leashed beast that exacted its perverse justice, but they soon died down. However, a new gladiator entered the arena, a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn on. He died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during one of the shows.

For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast that exacted its perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto his body. He died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast that exacted its perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto his body. He died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

languages.text: Eine Zeitlang erzählte man auf den Straßen von Commorragh von einem Chem-Pan-Sey, begleitet von einer angeleinten Bestie, der seine perverse Gerechtigkeit durchsetzte, aber diese Gerüchte verstummten bald wieder. Allerdings betrat zu dieser Zeit auch ein neuer Gladiator die Arena – ein muskulöser Folterer, auf dessen Körper ein Hundekopf genäht war. Er starb bei dem Versuch, während einer Show auf die Tribüne des Archons zu klettern.
languages.original_text: For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

traits.locale_text: Eine Zeitlang erzählte man auf den Straßen von Commorragh von einem Chem-Pan-Sey, begleitet von einer angeleinten Bestie, der seine perverse Gerechtigkeit durchsetzte, aber diese Gerüchte verstummten bald wieder. Allerdings betrat zu dieser Zeit auch ein neuer Gladiator die Arena – ein muskulöser Folterer, auf dessen Körper ein Hundekopf genäht war. Er starb bei dem Versuch, während einer Show auf die Tribüne des Archons zu klettern.

languages.text: Pendant un temps, les rues de Commorragh bourdonnèrent d'histoires concernant un mon-keigh qui était accompagné d'une créature en laisse et exerçait une justice perverse, mais très vite, les rumeurs s'éteignirent. Dans le même temps, un nouveau gladiateur fit son entrée dans l'arène ; une gorgone tout en muscle à qui on avait cousu une tête de chien sur le corps. Néanmoins, la créature mourut en tentant d'atteindre la tribune de l'archonte au cours d'un combat.
languages.original_text: For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

traits.locale_text: Pendant un temps, les rues de Commorragh bourdonnèrent d'histoires concernant un mon-keigh qui était accompagné d'une créature en laisse et exerçait une justice perverse, mais très vite, les rumeurs s'éteignirent. Dans le même temps, un nouveau gladiateur fit son entrée dans l'arène ; une gorgone tout en muscle à qui on avait cousu une tête de chien sur le corps. Néanmoins, la créature mourut en tentant d'atteindre la tribune de l'archonte au cours d'un combat.

languages.text: 有那么一段时间，科摩罗的街道上流传起了一只猴子和一条狗的传闻，据说这个古怪的组合打算伸张正义。不过，关于他们的传言很快就消失了。大约在同一时间，一位新的角斗士来到了竞技场。那是一只肌肉发达的凌虐者，身上还缝着一颗狗头。在某次角斗中，它打算爬上执政官所在的看台，但最终一命呜呼。
languages.original_text: For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

traits.locale_text: 有那么一段时间，科摩罗的街道上流传起了一只猴子和一条狗的传闻，据说这个古怪的组合打算伸张正义。不过，关于他们的传言很快就消失了。大约在同一时间，一位新的角斗士来到了竞技场。那是一只肌肉发达的凌虐者，身上还缝着一颗狗头。在某次角斗中，它打算爬上执政官所在的看台，但最终一命呜呼。
有那么一段时间，科摩罗的街道上流传起了一只猴子和一条狗的传闻，据说这个古怪的组合打算伸张正义。不过，关于他们的传言很快就消失了。大约在同一时间，一位新的角斗士来到了竞技场。那是一只肌肉发达的凌虐者，身上还缝着一颗狗头。在某次角斗中，他打算爬上执政官所在的看台，最终一命呜呼。

languages.text: Durante un tiempo, las calles de Commorragh estuvieron llenas de rumores de un mon-keigh acompañado por una bestia encadenada que ejercía una perversa justicia, pero estas historias no tardaron en olvidarse. No obstante, en esa misma época, un nuevo gladiador entró a la arena: un Atormentado musculoso con la cabeza de un perro cosida a su cuerpo. Murió intentando escalar hasta el palco del Arconte durante un espectáculo.
languages.original_text: For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

traits.locale_text: Durante un tiempo, las calles de Commorragh estuvieron llenas de rumores de un mon-keigh acompañado por una bestia encadenada que ejercía una perversa justicia, pero estas historias no tardaron en olvidarse. No obstante, en esa misma época, un nuevo gladiador entró a la arena: un Atormentado musculoso con la cabeza de un perro cosida a su cuerpo. Murió intentando escalar hasta el palco del Arconte durante un espectáculo.

languages.text: しばらくの間、コモラフの通りは、モン＝ケイとともに鎖につながれた獣が歪んだ正義を執行するという話で賑わっていたが、その噂はやがて収まった。しかし、その頃、新たなグラディエイターが闘技場に現れた。筋骨隆々のラックに犬の頭が縫い付けられた姿をした者だった。彼はショーの最中にアーコンの観覧席に登ろうとして命を落とした。
languages.original_text: For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

traits.locale_text: しばらくの間、コモラフの通りは、モン＝ケイとともに鎖につながれた獣が歪んだ正義を執行するという話で賑わっていたが、その噂はやがて収まった。しかし、その頃、新たなグラディエイターが闘技場に現れた。筋骨隆々のラックに犬の頭が縫い付けられた姿をした者だった。彼はショーの最中にアーコンの観覧席に登ろうとして命を落とした。

languages.text: Bir müddet Commorragh sokakları, tasmalı bir canavar eşliğinde kendi sapkın adaletini icra eden bir mon-keigh'in hikâyeleriyle çalkalansa da bu söylentiler çok geçmeden kesildi. Ne var ki tam o sıralarda arenaya yeni bir gladyatör adım attı: Vücuduna bir köpek başı dikilmiş, kas yığını bir Harap. Bir gösteri sırasında bu Harap, Arkon'un locasına tırmanmaya yeltenirken can verdi.
languages.original_text: For a time, Commorragh's streets were abuzz with tales of a mon-keigh accompanied by a leashed beast who exacted his perverse justice, but these rumours soon died down. However, around that time, a new gladiator entered the arena — a muscular Wrack with a dog's head sewn onto its body. It died while trying to climb the Archon's stand during a show.

traits.locale_text: Bir müddet Commorragh sokakları, tasmalı bir canavar eşliğinde kendi sapkın adaletini icra eden bir mon-keigh hikâyeleriyle çalkalanıyordu ancak bu söylentiler çok geçmeden kesildi. Ne var ki tam o sıralarda, arenaya yeni bir gladyatör adım attı: Vücuduna bir köpek başı dikilmiş, kas yığını bir Harap. Bir gösteri sırasında bu Harap, Arkon'un locasına tırmanmaya yeltenirken can verdi.
